---
title: <span class="badge object-type-enum"></span> BinaryOp
---
# <span class="badge object-type-enum"></span> BinaryOp

Possible binary operators.

## Definition

```python
class BinaryOp(enum.StrEnum):
    """
    Possible binary operators.
    """

    ADD = "+"
    SUB = "-"
    MUL = "*"
    DIV = "/"
    MOD = "%"
    POW = "^"
    EQL = "=="
    NEQ = "!="
    GTR = ">"
    LSS = "<"
    GTE = ">="
    LTE = "<="
    AND = "and"
    OR = "or"
    UNLESS = "unless"
    ATAN2 = "atan2"
```
